title: Stone Cold
description: Alternate cover edition for ASIN B00JEHRLDO"His hard body is pressed against my back and I can’t look away from our reflection in the mirror.One of his hands leaves my breast and vanishes, unseen but not unfelt."I never thought I’d bury my brother.Brian Hatcher has a lot of nerve, I thought I’d never see his face again.He left the police force to join the Iron Tornadoes, the very gang my brother was investigating.I hate him.I should hate him.I want to hate him.He has turned his back on everything he used to stand for.Yet I want him, even though he’s turned into a stone cold biker.
author: Olivia Rigal
